information: The grinder is structure who transform into a machine when built ( more info /palahelp -> gui > grinder ) it can create various item like hammer, fastsword or broadsword for example
It can be use to apply upgrade for those item or the pickaxe of the gods

It need fuel to work, it can work in 3 modes : paladium, green paladium and endium to make different tier of items To change modes make sure to empty the grinder via patern and break and replace the central block ( grinder block )
